devdoc.details: This contract must NEVER hold funds!Maliciously crafted transaction payloads could wipe out any funds left here

callWithSyncFee(address,bytes,address,ui.details: This is the most straightforward use case, and `transfer` handles token payments.

params._feeToken: Payment can be done in native and ERC-20 tokens
params._taskId: Unique task identifier generated by gelato

sponsoredCall((uint256,address,bytes),ad.details: Payment is handled with off-chain accounting using Gelato's 1Balance system

params._call: Relay call data packed into SponsoredCall struct
params._taskId: Unique task identifier generated by gelato

sponsoredUserAuthCall((uint256,address,b.details: Payment is handled with off-chain accounting using Gelato's 1Balance systemThe userNonce abstraction does not support multiple calls (call concurrency)Apps that need concurrent user calls will need to implement multi-callingon their end via encoding into _call.data.

params._call: Relay call data packed into SponsoredUserAuthCall struct
params._taskId: Unique task identifier generated by gelato

devdoc.title: Gelato Relay contract

callWithSyncFee(address,bytes,address,ui.notice: Relay call with Synchronous PaymentThe target contract pays Gelato during the call forward

sponsoredCall((uint256,address,bytes),ad.notice: Relay call + One Balance payment - with sponsor authenticationSponsor signature allows for payment via sponsor's 1Balance balanceOracle value for exchange rate between native tokens and fee token

sponsoredUserAuthCall((uint256,address,b.notice: Relay call + One Balance payment - with BOTH sponsor and user authenticationBoth sponsor and user signature allows for payment via sponsor's 1Balance balance

userdoc.notice: This contract deals with synchronous payments and Gelato 1Balance payments
